name: Public Safety Communication Europe
membership: Federation of European Union Fire Officer Associations (FEU)
goal: PSCE is a permanent autonomous organisation, working to foster, by consensus building, excellence in the development and use of public safety communication and information management systems. PSCE provides a forum, where researchers, industry and users can meet to discuss and exchange ideas and best practices, develop roadmaps and improve the future of public safety communications.
interests: Communication, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
EU policies affecting broadband, spectrum allocation, mobile deices, 5G, satellite communications, as well as public safety, cyber security and terrorism

Common foreign and Security Policy, European Agenda on Security, EU Digital Single Mrket Strategy, eCall, Eu Civil Protection Mechanism
